member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio
member.summary: The Audio facet groups audio-related data on OneDrive into a single structure.
member.remarks: It is available on the property of resources that have associated audio.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Album
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the album for this audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.AlbumArtist
member.summary: Gets or sets the artist named on the album for the audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Artist
member.summary: Gets or sets the performing artist for the audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Bitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets bitrate expressed in kbps.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Composers
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the composer of the audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Copyright
member.summary: Gets or sets copyright information for the audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Disc
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the disc this audio file came from.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.DiscCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of discs in this album.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets duration of the audio file, expressed in milliseconds.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Genre
member.summary: Gets or sets the genre of this audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.HasDrm
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the file is protected with digital rights management.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.IsVariableBitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the file is encoded with a variable bitrate.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Track
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the track on the original disc for this audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.TrackCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of tracks on the original disc for this audio file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Audio.Year
member.summary: Gets or sets the year the audio file was recorded.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ConflictBehavior
member.summary: Determines what to do if an item with a matching name already exists in this folder.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ConflictBehavior.Rename
member.summary: OneDrive will append a number to the end of the item name (for files - before the extension).

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ConflictBehavior.Replace
member.summary: Content will be replaced

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ConflictBehavior.Fail
member.summary: Default behavior

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Deleted
member.summary: The Deleted facet indicates that the item on OneDrive has been deleted.

remarks.para: In this version of the API, the presence (non-null) of the facet value indicates that the file was deleted. A null (or missing) value indicates that the file is not deleted.
Note: While this facet is empty today, in future API revisions the facet may be populated with additional properties.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Drive
member.summary: The Drive resource represents a drive in OneDrive.
member.remarks: It provides information about the owner of the drive, total and available storage space, and exposes a collection of all the s contained within the drive.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Drive.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the drive.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Drive.DriveType
member.summary: Gets or sets the enumerated value that identifies the type of drive account.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Drive.Owner
member.summary: Gets or sets the user account that owns the drive.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Drive.Quota
member.summary: Gets or sets the information about the drive's storage space quota.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.DriveType
member.summary: Enumerated value that identifies the type of drive account.
member.remarks: OneDrive drives will show as personal.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.DriveType.Personal
member.summary: OneDrive drive

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.DriveType.Business
member.summary: OneDrive business drive (Sharepoint)

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.File
member.summary: The File facet groups file-related data on OneDrive into a single structure.
member.remarks: It is available on the property of resources that represent files.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.File.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the MIME type for the file.
member.remarks: This is determined by logic on the server and might not be the value provided when the file was uploaded.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.File.Hashes
member.summary: Gets or sets the hashes of the file's binary content, if available.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.FileSystemInfo
member.summary: The FileSystemInfo facet contains properties that are reported by the device's local file system for the local version of an item.
member.remarks: This facet can be used to specify the last modified date or created date of the item as it was on the local device.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.FileSystemInfo.CreatedDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC date and time the file was created on a client.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.FileSystemInfo.LastModifiedDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC date and time the file was last modified on a client.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Folder
member.summary: The Folder facet groups folder-related data on OneDrive into a single structure.
member.remarks: It is available on the property of resources that represent folders.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Folder.ChildCount
member.summary: Gets or sets number of children contained immediately within this container.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.HashesType
member.summary: The Hashes facet groups different types of hashes into a single structure, for an item on OneDrive.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.HashesType.Crc32Hash
member.summary: Gets or sets the CRC32 value of the file (if available)

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.HashesType.Sha1Hash
member.summary: Gets or sets the SHA1 hash for the contents of the file (if available)

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Identity
member.summary: The Identity type represents an identity of an actor.
member.remarks: For example, and actor can be a user, device, or application.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Identity.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the identity.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Identity.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets the identity's display name.
member.remarks: Note that this may not always be available or up to date. For example, if a user changes their display name, OneDrive may show the new value in a future response, but the items associated with the user won't show up as having changed in view.delta.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.IdentitySet
member.summary: The IdentitySet type is a keyed collection of Identity objects.
member.remarks: It is used to represent a set of identities associated with various events for an item, such as created by or last modified by.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.IdentitySet.User
member.summary: Gets or sets the Identity resource that represents a user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.IdentitySet.Application
member.summary: Gets or sets the Identity resource that represents the application.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.IdentitySet.Device
member.summary: Gets or sets the Identity resource that represents the device.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Image
member.summary: The Image groups image-related data on OneDrive into a single structure.
member.remarks: It is available on the property of resources that represent images.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Image.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the image, in pixels.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Image.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the image, in pixels.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item
member.summary: The Item resource type represents metadata for an item in OneDrive.
member.remarks: All top-level filesystem objects in OneDrive are Item resources. If an item is a Folder or File facet, the Item resource will contain a value for either the folder or file property, respectively.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the item within the Drive. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the item (filename and extension). Read-write.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.ETag
member.summary: Gets or sets the eTag for the entire item (metadata + content). Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.CTag
member.summary: Gets or sets the eTag for the content of the item. Read-only.
member.remarks: This eTag is not changed if only the metadata is changed.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.CreatedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the identity of the user, device, and application which created the item. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.ModifiedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the identity of the user, device, and application which last modified the item. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.CreatedDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time of item creation. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.LastModifiedDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time the item was last modified. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the item in bytes. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.WebUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL that displays the resource in the browser. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-visible description of the item. Read-write.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.ParentReference
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent information, if the item has a parent. Read-write.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Children
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection containing Item objects for the immediate children of Item.
member.remarks: Only items representing folders have children.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Folder
member.summary: Gets or sets the folder metadata, if the item is a folder. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.File
member.summary: Gets or sets the file metadata, if the item is a file. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.FileSystemInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the file system information on client. Read-write.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Image
member.summary: Gets or sets the image metadata, if the item is an image. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Photo
member.summary: Gets or sets the photo metadata, if the item is a photo. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Audio
member.summary: Gets or sets the audio metadata, if the item is an audio file. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Video
member.summary: Gets or sets the video metadata, if the item is a video. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the location metadata, if the item has location data. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.SearchResult
member.summary: Gets or sets the search metadata, if the item is from a search result.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Deleted
member.summary: Gets or sets the information about the deleted state of the item. Read-only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.Thumbnails
member.summary: Gets or sets the Thumbnails for this item.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.SpecialFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the specialFolder facet that describes the identifier used for accessing the special folder.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Item.ConflictBehavior
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines what to do if an item with a matching name already exists in this folder.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ItemReference
member.summary: The itemReference type groups data needed to reference a OneDrive item across the service into a single structure.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ItemReference.DriveId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the Drive that contains the item.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ItemReference.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the item.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ItemReference.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the path that used to navigate to the item.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Location
member.summary: The Location facet groups geographic location-related data on OneDrive into a single structure.
member.remarks: It is available on the property of resources that have an associated geographic location.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Location.Altitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the altitude (height), in feet, above sea level for the item.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Location.Latitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the latitude, in decimal, for the item.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Location.Longitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the longitude, in decimal, for the item.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Permission
member.summary: Represents a permission on a OneDrive item.
member.remarks: Permissions in OneDrive have a number of different forms. The object represents these different forms through facets on the object.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Permission.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the permission among all permissions on the item. Read Only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Permission.Roles
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of permission, e.g. read. See below for the full list of roles.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Permission.Link
member.summary: Gets or sets the link details of the current permission, if it is a link type permissions. Read Only.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Permission.InheritedFrom
member.summary: Gets or sets a reference to the ancestor of the current permission, if it is inherited from an ancestor. Read Only.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo
member.summary: The Photo facet groups photo-related data on OneDrive, for example, EXIF metadata, into a single structure.
member.remarks: It is available on the property of resources that represent photos.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.TakenDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time the photo was taken.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.CameraMake
member.summary: Gets or sets the camera manufacturer.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.CameraModel
member.summary: Gets or sets the camera model.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.FNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the F-stop value from the camera.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.ExposureDenominator
member.summary: Gets or sets the denominator for the exposure time fraction from the camera.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.ExposureNumerator
member.summary: Gets or sets the numerator for the exposure time fraction from the camera.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.FocalLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the focal length from the camera.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Photo.Iso
member.summary: Gets or sets the ISO value from the camera.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Quota
member.summary: The Quota facet groups storage space quota-related information on OneDrive into a single structure.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Quota.Total
member.summary: Gets or sets the total allowed storage space, in bytes.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Quota.Used
member.summary: Gets or sets the total space used, in bytes.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Quota.Remaining
member.summary: Gets or sets the total space remaining before reaching the quota limit, in bytes.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Quota.Deleted
member.summary: Gets or sets the total space consumed by files in the recycle bin, in bytes.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Quota.State
member.summary: Gets or sets the enumeration value that indicates the state of the storage space.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.QuotaState
member.summary: Enumeration value that indicates the state of the storage space.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.QuotaState.Normal
member.summary: The drive has plenty of remaining quota left.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.QuotaState.Nearing
member.summary: Remaining quota is less than 10% of total quota space.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.QuotaState.Critical
member.summary: Remaining quota is less than 1% of total quota space.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.QuotaState.Exceeded
member.summary: The used quota has exceeded the total quota.
member.remarks: New files or folders cannot be added to the drive until it is under the total quota amount.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ResultList`1
member.summary: Represents a collection of objects of type
member.typeparam: The type of the collection returned

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ResultList`1.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the returned collection

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SearchResultFacet
member.summary: The SearchResultFacet facet groups search result metadata into a single structure.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SearchResultFacet.OnClickTelemetryUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the callback URL that is used to record telemetry information.
member.remarks: The application should issue a GET on this URL if the user interacts with this item.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLink
member.summary: The SharingLink type groups sharing link-related data on OneDrive into a single structure.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLink.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets the access token that represents the current link permission.
member.remarks: You can use this in place of other authentication tokens to access the resource the current permission is set for.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLink.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the link created.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLink.WebUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets an URL that opens the item in the browser on the OneDrive website.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLink.Application
member.summary: Gets or sets the app the link is associated with.
member.remarks: The value is missing or null if the link is associated with an official Microsoft app.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLinkType
member.summary: The type of the link created.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLinkType.View
member.summary: A view-only sharing link, allowing read-only access.

member.name: F:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SharingLinkType.Edit
member.summary: An edit sharing link, allowing read-write access.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SpecialFolder
member.summary: The SpecialFolder facet provides information about how a folder on OneDrive can be accessed via the special folders collection.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.SpecialFolder.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this item in the /drive/special collection

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Thumbnail
member.summary: The Thumbnail resource type represents a thumbnail for an image, video, document, or any file or folder on OneDrive that has a graphical representation.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Thumbnail.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the thumbnail, in pixels.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Thumbnail.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the thumbnail, in pixels.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Thumbnail.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL used to fetch the thumbnail content.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ThumbnailSet
member.summary: The ThumbnailSet type is a keyed collection of objects.
member.remarks: It is used to represent a set of thumbnails associated with a single file on OneDrive.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ThumbnailSet.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the id within the item.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ThumbnailSet.Small
member.summary: Gets or sets the 48x48 cropped thumbnail.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ThumbnailSet.Medium
member.summary: Gets or sets the 176x176 scaled thumbnail.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ThumbnailSet.Large
member.summary: Gets or sets the 1920x1920 scaled thumbnail.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.ThumbnailSet.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom thumbnail image or the original image used to generate other thumbnails.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.UploadSession
member.summary: Provides information about a large file upload session.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.UploadSession.UploadUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets theURL where fragment PUT requests should be directed.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.UploadSession.ExpirationDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the upload session expires.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.UploadSession.NextExpectedRanges
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of byte ranges the server is missing. Not always a full list of the missing ranges.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.UploadSession.ToHttpRange
member.summary: Gets the as

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Video
member.summary: The Video facet groups video-related data on OneDrive into a single complex type.
member.remarks: It is available on the property of resources that represent videos.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Microsoft.OneDrive.Model.Video.Bitrate
